item.title: Beogram 4002 Type 5513: Finishing Up The Tangential Arm Position Sensor & The Fixed Arm Platter Sensor
item.description:
I was pleased to discover that Beolover successfully refurbished the platter motor for my Beogram 4002. During the packing process for the motor’s return, I took the opportunity to calibrate the voltage for two newly installed sensor lamps within the Beogram. The recently added LED replacement light for the tangential arm position sensor was insufficiently bright.
